title: Bosch 30" Benchmark Series Gas Slide-In Range HGIP054SS - Overview
description:
Shop for the Bosch 30" Benchmark Series Gas Slide-In Range at Abt: http://www.abt.com/product/77856/Bosch-30-Benchmark-Series-Gas-Slide-In-Stainless-Steel-Range-HGIP054SS.html?utm_source=youtube&utm_medium=video&utm_campaign=HGIP054SS_20160908

Key Features:

- The New Bosch Slide-in Range Fits in Any Freestanding Range Cutout.
- Dampened Hinges Softly and Quietly Guide the QuiteClose Door Shut.
- The Warming Drawer Keeps Everything You Cook Warm and Ready to Serve.
- Powerful 20000 BTU Center Burner Designed for Faster Boiling and Low Simmer.
- A Full-Extension Telescopic Rack Offers Safe Access to the Oven Cavity.

Features:

Design

- Touch Control for Easier Operation of the Oven
- Heavy-duty Metal Knobs for a Premium Look and Feel
- Low-profile Design for an Integrated Appearance
- Stainless Steel Maintop

Performance

- 9 Specialized Cooking Modes - Gourmet Cooking Made Easy
- Standard Convection
- Temperature Conversion for Convection Cooking
- Meat Probe Takes Guesswork Out of Cooking

Convenience

- 5 Burners Add Flexibility to your Cooking
- Two Oven Lights to Better Monitor Cooking Progress
- Kitchen Timer
- Extra Large Door Window for Easy Monitoring of Cooking Process
- Star-K certified. 100°-450° F

Capacity

- Large Capacity at 4.6 Cu Ft.
- Recessed 8 Pass Broil Element for Increased Capacity and Safety

Specifications:

General Properties

- Cooking method primary cavity Convection Bake Convection Roast Dough proving Half width variable grill pizza setting Sabbath function Selfcleaning pyrolitic Small hot air grill Top/bottom heat Warming Warming drawer
- Cleaning system - primary cavity  Self Clean
- Display red white
- Safety device automatic reignition Thermostat
- Number of Double grates 2
- Knob Material Full metal

Burner/Element Performance

- Total number of cooktop burners 5
- Total BTU load 92500 BTU
- Location of 1st heating element front left
- Power of 1st burner (BTU) 10000 BTU
- Location of 2nd heating element back left
- Power of 2nd burner (BTU) 10000 BTU
- Location of 3rd heating element middle back
- Power of 3rd burner (BTU) 20000 BTU
- Location of 4th heating element back right
- Power of 4th burner (BTU) 5000 BTU
- Location of 5th heating element front right
- Power of 5th burner (BTU) 15000 BTU
- Sealed Burners Yes

Certifications

- Approval certificates CSA

Installation Requirements

- Current (A) 15 A
- Volts (V) 120 V
- Frequency (Hz) 60 Hz
- Gas type Natural gas 15 mbar (USA)
- Alternative gas type Liquid gas 275 mbar (USA)

Included Accessories

- Use and care manual
- Installation guide
- Mounting hardware
- Island trim
- Meat probe
- LP conversion kit
- Standard racks
- Telescopic rack

Approximate Weight:

- Unit: 221 lbs
- Shipping: 243 lbs

Approximate Dimensions:

- Depth: 26.75
- Height: 35.50
- Width: 31.25
- Required cutout size (HxWxD): 30 width slide-in
- Variable cooker height: 1

Warranty Information:

Manufacturer Warranty (authorized online retailer): 1 Year Parts And Labor
